thread.title: NYPD details New Year's Eve in Times Square security plan
thread.title_full: NYPD details New Year's Eve in Times Square security plan

author: AOL Staff
title: NYPD details New Year's Eve in Times Square security plan
text: NYPD details New Year's Eve in Times Square security plan NEW YORK -- [New York City](https://www.cbsnews.com/newyork/tag/new-york-city/?ftag=YHF4eb9d17) officials are warning people to be on high alert this weekend, with about 1 million revelers set to celebrate [New Year's Eve](https://www.cbsnews.com/newyork/tag/new-years-eve/?ftag=YHF4eb9d17) in [Times Square](https://www.cbsnews.com/newyork/tag/times-square/?ftag=YHF4eb9d17) on Sunday. A [law enforcement bulletin obtained by CBS News](https://www.cbsnews.com/news/new-intelligence-bulletin-notes-likely-heightened-threats-of-violence-around-holidays/?ftag=YHF4eb9d17) warned of a likely "heightened threat of violence" through the holidays, particularly at large gatherings, by lone actors. The [NYPD](https://www.cbsnews.com/newyork/tag/nypd/?ftag=YHF4eb9d17) said there were no specific, credible threats to New York City. There have been [nearly 500 protests in the city](https://www.cbsnews.com/newyork/news/nypd-preparing-for-israel-hamas-war-protesters-to-attempt-to-disrupt-new-years-eve-in-times-square-mayor-adams-says/?ftag=YHF4eb9d17) since the Israel-Hamas war started in October, adding a level to safety concerns this year. [Mayor Eric Adams](https://www.cbsnews.com/newyork/tag/eric-adams/?ftag=YHF4eb9d17) and NYPD officials provided a briefing on New Year's Eve safety precautions on Friday. Watch it in the player above. CBS New York's Tim McNicholas will have more on Times Square security on CBS2 News tonight.
